channel.title: Alot of Black mesa Errors
channel.description:
Hello Black mesa Team. I decided to play game once again,
I find out that there are some bugs come up in the course of months Some of NPC are not talking or there are some Lichts error Flikkering.
So i did re-instal mod and Source engine 2006/2007 So nothing work so far
I have save file, but dont know how to uploud it, so i desided to give hier 1 line of command it was saying.
Failed to load sound "^weapons\357\reload_npc.wav", file probably missing from disk/repository Attempted to create unknown entity type ! NULL Ent in NPCMaker!
Eddit Windows 8.1 64-bit Intel Core i5 2500K 8,00GB Dual-Channel DDR3 GeForce GTX 680

item.title: Alot of Black mesa Errors
item.dc:creator: darkempire
item.description:
Hello Black mesa Team.
I decided to play game once again,

I find out that there are some bugs come up in the course of months
Some of NPC are not talking or there are some Lichts error Flikkering.

So i did re-instal mod and Source engine 2006/2007
So nothing work so far

I have save file, but dont know how to uploud it,
so i desided to give hier 1 line of command it was saying.

Failed to load sound “^weapons\357\reload_npc.wav”, file probably missing from disk/repository
Attempted to create unknown entity type !
NULL Ent in NPCMaker!

Eddit
Windows 8.1 64-bit
Intel Core i5 2500K
8,00GB Dual-Channel DDR3
GeForce GTX 680

Read full topic
